message: I want to stop by more frequently but am concerned because the internet drops pretty frequently.  Any updates on that?
I solved my problem with tethering.  Yay phone!
Scott's been trying hard to fix the connection problems but there's only so much one can do with Bell :(
Just myself and Scott now...  Folks have been dropping in, but leaving after the internet drops them.
Yup, much thanks to Scott.  He's doing his level best.
Internet's back on at Mercury Grove... hope it stays this way.
that's very good to hear; I want to make Mercury Grove a regular part of my week; and hoping to meet a couple of the Django people on this list in person (@saikimu etc)
I'll be there this week, unless I have to sit around and wait for Rogers to hook up my TekSavvy cable internet...
@rvanmelle I'm here most days from about 10AM onwards. I'm new to the Ottawa startups/dev scene so I'd be glad to meet.
roughly what hours is the MG office active?
Just asked Scott this the other day.
Looked it up yesterday.  Google says it will only take 34 mins to bike to MG! :o  Taking the car takes 15 and the bus 45!  Wow
Going to try for MG on Friday (June 10th).  Maybe show up for around 9:30am and have lunch with anyone interested.  Takers?
I'm in.  Been meaning to get out of my house...  It's been a productive week, but I'm getting that "itch" to go somewhere.
lunch would be awesome!  I'll be there shortly before 12:00
